data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 293,600 people living in Rutana, Burundi. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rutana, Burundi
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Rutana, Burundi.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 185,626 people in the state of Rutana who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Rutana to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Swahili people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Rutana. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Rutana, Burundi to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Rutana, Burundi a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
